localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt

nodes.excerpt: Introducing some of Tesla's most creative features, from a new Light Show function that lets you choreograph light shows to your own music, to new games and entertainment experiences, safety features, customizable controls and an all-new user-interface design.
nodes.title: Tesla Version 11.0 - Tesla's biggest holiday release yet
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: With Postly you can write your Social Media Post once, and Publish it on the most popular social media platforms: LIVE PLATFORMS Facebook Instagram Twitter LinkedIn YouTube Pinterest TikTok Reddit COMING SOON WordPress WhatsApp RSS Feed
nodes.title: Postly - Social media marketing made easy
nodes.author: Paul Onu

nodes.excerpt: Online editor with super powers. Customise your writing experience, build your Wikis, use power of AI analysis to check readability and phonetic quality, use extremely advanced spell check for more than 20 languages, export your books. Write smarter.
nodes.title: Writex.io - An online editor with super powers
nodes.author: Maxim Vetrenko

nodes.excerpt: myyearinreview helps you reflect on your year in a simple, guided and fun way
nodes.title: My Year in Review - Reflect on your year 2021 in minutes
nodes.author: Rutik Wankhade

nodes.excerpt: A simple application that bootstraps your notion pages to a blog site. No more complicated setups, users can simply log in and add database id, that's it. Moreover, user can add their social links to increase their reach. Showcase: https://www.notiondiary.xyz/lakshya
nodes.title: Notion Diary - Bootstraps your notion pages to a blogsite
nodes.author: Lakshya Khera

nodes.excerpt: PipeCandy is now the only company that tracks all eCommerce companies with at least $10,000 annual revenue. With this launch, we also track 150,000 DTC brands.
nodes.title: PipeCandy Prospector - Ground truth about global e-commerce and DTC companies
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: See up to 4x more replies from LinkedIn outreach with video! Just install the Sendspark Chrome Extension to record and insert videos right from Sales Navigator and the LinkedIn message composer.
nodes.title: Sendspark for Linkedin - Drive more sales meetings with videos on Linkedin
nodes.author: Brandon Escalante

nodes.excerpt: We leverage AI (with a human touch) to generate product ideas based on your interests, skills, and past projects.
nodes.title: Product Ideas On-Demand - Get ideas that match your interests, skills and projects
nodes.author: Jakob Greenfeld

nodes.excerpt: I love generating ideas with GPT-3 and I had an idea to feed it with products created by the top (and my favorite) makers and then I told it to predict what their next projects will be. I thought the results were interesting!
nodes.title: Product Prediction - I asked GPT-3 to guess what the top makers will build next
nodes.author: joseph

nodes.excerpt: Momento is a tool to help you take action. Your life is very precious so make it worth it.
nodes.title: Momento - A minimalist life reminder
nodes.author: Mohammed

nodes.excerpt: Chord is a commerce-as-a-service software for fast-growing D2C brands. We offer a flexible (headless) tech stack for commerce companies that is fully equipped with sophisticated data insights for the optimal customer experience.
nodes.title: Chord Commerce - Headless commerce is hard, we make it easy for you
nodes.author: Toni Akinwumi

nodes.excerpt: Get advice from the great marketers who can help you craft catchy taglines for your product or article.
nodes.title: 1Tagline - Marketing gurus to help craft amazing texts
nodes.author: Krysty

nodes.excerpt: A no-code machine learning platform built to unleash the power of computer vision and automation. It's a smart, scalable, cost-effective ML API as a service platform that trains and integrates state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning.
nodes.title: DeepLobe - Your no-code machine learning platform
nodes.author: Ramesh Damma

nodes.excerpt: This is the web version of the famous flip clock that we see all over the internet
nodes.title: Flip Clock - The famous flip clock available on the web
nodes.author: Tanmay M

nodes.excerpt: The fastest way to capture and structure your thoughts: through voice. Hold record, speak, and release. Just like you'd expect from an outliner, create hierarchies and rearrange. Notes are auto-transcribed and searchable. Local-first and open source.
nodes.title: Voiceliner - Braindump better.

nodes.excerpt: Wikifox (beta) is a clean and simplified version of the real Wikipedia! This works with official Wikipedia, so nothing to worry about!. It has a good and clean user interface with Dark, Light and custom themes! Check it out : https://wikifox.ml/
nodes.title: Wikifox - Wikipedia reimagined - clean, simplified, powerful

nodes.excerpt: Flickcall is a privacy-focused browser extension to watch movies & TV shows together. Your personal chats & video stream are delivered directly to peers (without backend servers). Supports Netflix, Youtube, Primevideo, Hotstar, & Zee5.
nodes.title: Flickcall - Watch together on your favorite streaming platforms

nodes.excerpt: Otis House is a marketplace, auction platform, and vault for physical items, built on top of Ethereum. The physical items are stored, secured, and insured by Otis. We then mint an NFT for each item representing ownership of the asset.

nodes.title: minulle - Preview YouTube thumbnails and titles before you upload

nodes.excerpt: OrgPad is a universal tool. It is good for planning, brainstorming, presentations, storing information, but it's also good for long-term work like learning for an exam or tracking a project. At first, it'll remind you of Mind Maps but it's so much more!
nodes.title: OrgPad - A simple and easy-to-use app that liberates your thinking

nodes.title: Image to Cartoon - Best AI cartoonizer online for free

nodes.excerpt: New version of GlitchÃ© is a perfect NFT-art tool with glitch-filters based on random data that cannot be recreated. Datamosh up to three videos from your camera roll or experiment with real-time recording.
nodes.title: GlitchÃ© NFT Tool - Create NFT art in a few taps

nodes.excerpt: HomeMovie brings back the nostalgia of the Camcorder with a twist. Create and record together with friends. As you capture the moment, you see all clips from everyone on the tape come in as they happen. It's a fun way to create memories together!
nodes.title: HomeMovie - Create memories together
nodes.author: Dennis Gecaj

nodes.excerpt: Until now, there have been few ways to share critical data across whole organizations at scale. TV Dashboards let you replace unnecessary meetings, interruptions, emails & link sharing by putting your data up on your workplace TV screens for all to see.
nodes.title: Fugo TV Dashboards - Securely share business intelligence data on TV screens

nodes.excerpt: App for Meditation. It uses your cognitive biases of time estimates and encourages you to meditate more often.
nodes.title: Pokoy - Fibonacci timer for meditation
nodes.author: Martyn

nodes.excerpt: You wouldn't expect to rank highly on Google without SEO. - Video transcriptions are crucial for the YT algorithm to know what your video is about. Auto-generated ones don't count. - Get fast, accurate and cheap transcriptions to get you the views you deserve.
nodes.title: YouTube Transcripts 2.0 - SEO optimized YouTube transcripts, now with one click

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Apollo Ultra, The Worldâ€™s Fastest Charging Power Bank. Thanks to graphene enhancement, this 10,000mAh power bank charges itself at 100W in just under 27 minutes. You can even fast charge all of your devices with up to 85W of power.
nodes.title: Elecjet Apollo Ultra - Fastest charging power bank
nodes.author: Norayr Margarian

nodes.excerpt: BikeSpot.fr is a crowdsourced app for sharing and downloading GPS bike routes. Our mission: Allow riders discovering the unexplored and connect them together. Find your next ride on BikeSpot!
nodes.title: BikeSpot - We help you explore our world and meet adventurers
nodes.author: Nicolas Mercier

nodes.excerpt: D2C Hunt helps you find hundreds of brands Indian D2C brands ( Direct to consumer brands) you can collaborate with!! Saves you hundreds of hours of googling and scrolling through Instagram.
nodes.title: D2C Hunt - Find hundreds of D2C brands you can collaborate with

nodes.excerpt: Newsly picks up the most trending topics on the web and reads them in a natural voice. Now you can follow any topic you can think of, be it NFT, Metaverse, or The Kardashians! The entire web becomes listenable! Now also with podcasts, read mode and weather.
nodes.title: Newsly 2.0 - Reads top trending news & articles in a natural human voice

nodes.excerpt: The Outlet Finance app allows your to replace your bank account with a simple and easy to use crypto wallet that is designed for the non crypto person.
nodes.title: Outlet Finance - Replace your bank account with DeFi

nodes.excerpt: Finding the right music for a video can be challenging. And buying a proper license can be tricky. That's why the new Fugue comes with 5X more curated tracks and simple pricing. So you can get more music on a budget.
nodes.title: Fugue 3.0 - Fresh music to make your videos a blast
nodes.author: Ivan Braun

nodes.excerpt: Make your presentations or screen recordings more engaging by showing yourself on your desktop. Record a YouTube video, remove background from camera footage without requiring a green screen. Keep focus on your face just like iPad's centre stage, but on Mac.
nodes.title: Presentation Camera - Live video on your Mac
nodes.author: Pawan Dixit

nodes.title: AVDA: Find Jobs & Careers - An easy, resume-free way to find and apply for jobs

nodes.excerpt: Slidekick is your personal AI presentation assistant. It asks you a few questions about the slide deck you want to make and then creates it for you. This is a beta version. It has 1 use case: creating a startup pitch deck. More use cases will be added soon.
nodes.title: Slidekick - AI-powered slide deck builder, powered by GPT-3
nodes.author: Victor Metelskiy
